item.title: Box Office: ‘Him’ Targets $15 Million Debut, Margot Robbie and Colin Farrell’s ‘A Big Bold Beautiful Journey’ Aims for $10 Million
item.description: So far, the September box office has been propelled by sleeper hits. After the back-to-back surprise successes of “The Conjuring: Last Rites” and “Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infi
